statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests;
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, request_description, resolution_date FROM MaintenanceRequests ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests, MAX(request_date) AS latest_request_date FROM MaintenanceRequests;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 100 ORDER BY request_date DESC, resolution_date ASC;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01' AND property_id IN (10, 20, 30) ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, count(request_id) AS num_requests FROM MaintenanceRequests GROUP BY property_id HAVING count(request_id) > 5 ORDER BY num_requests DESC;
SELECT request_id, request_description, resolution_description FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE property_id = 50 AND (request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31') ORDER BY request_id;

SELECT request_id, resolution_description, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM resolution_date) AS resolution_year FROM MaintenanceRequests WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resolution_year ASC, request_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT requester_name, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 123;
SELECT request_date, request_description FROM maintenance_requests ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_resolutions WHERE resolution_status = 'completed';
SELECT resolver_name, resolution_date FROM maintenance_resolutions ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT property_id, requester_name FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 101 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, requester_name, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE requester_name LIKE 'John%' AND request_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE LENGTH(request_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_resolutions WHERE resolution_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM property WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT request_description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE id = 3;
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_description FROM maintenance_resolution WHERE request_id = 5;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address, property_type FROM property ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 100 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM property WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_name ASC;

SELECT m.request_description, p.property_name, r.resolution_date FROM maintenance_requests m JOIN property p ON m.property_id = p.property_id JOIN maintenance_resolution r ON m.id = r.request_id WHERE m.request_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY m.request_date ASC;
SELECT p.property_name, COUNT(*) as total_requests FROM property p JOIN maintenance_requests m ON p.property_id = m.property_id GROUP BY p.property_name ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY request_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, description, status FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM properties WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT technician_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone FROM technicians WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT request_id, property_id, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM properties WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT technician_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM technicians WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT request_id, resolution_date, technician_id FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests;
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_date, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_date, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 123 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, property_id, request_date, description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id = 100 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, request_date FROM maintenance_requests WHERE property_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY request_date ASC;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_requests WHERE description LIKE '%plumbing%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT request_id, property_id FROM maintenance_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
